feed.title: Mergeable Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.3.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.3.0 (beta).

What's Changed

  • Open a new tab on middle mouse click by @Savageman
  • Pull requests are stored in IndexedDB and refreshed via a SharedWorker by @pvcnt
  • Command bar to quickly navigate to a pull request using the keyboard by @pvcnt

New Contributors

  • @Savageman made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.4.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.4.0 (beta).

What's Changed

  • feat: support multiple queries in search string by @pvcnt
  • feat: implement an attention set by @pvcnt
  • docs: create a documentation website by @pvcnt
  • feat: report CI status in inbox by @pvcnt

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.5.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.5.0 (beta). This release contains an important bugfix that was preventing data synchronisation to happen automatically in background.

What's Changed

  • fix: prevent activities from running concurrently by @pvcnt
  • fix: sync data on schedule by @pvcnt

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.6.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.6.0 (beta). This release contains several important bugfixes that we recommend you apply to your installation. It also comes with an opt-out telemetry feature gathering anonymous usage statistics.

What's Changed

  • feat: add a telemetry server by @pvcnt
  • fix: disable concurrent activity execution protection by @pvcnt
  • fix: splitting queries incorrectly removed quotes by @pvcnt

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: correct diff text color in dark mode by @onbjerg
  • feat: add a button to copy pull URL by @pvcnt
  • chore: upgrade dexie and react-router by @pvcnt

New Contributors

  • @onbjerg made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0
